issue.title: [C++] Fix -Wrange-loop-construct warnings in clang-11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8358](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8358). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We might change one of our CI entries to use clang-11 so we get some more bleeding edge compiler warnings, to get out ahead of things

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8358?focusedCommentId=17077069) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
